# Git
.git
.gitignore
README.md

# Documentation
docs/
*.md

# Tests
tests/
*_test.go
coverage.out

# Development files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.log
*.tmp

# Build artifacts
bin/
dist/
build/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# Runtime data
pids/
*.pid
*.seed

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# Dependency directories
vendor/

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history
